ValidationRule.description: Case cannot be closed until a Quote Number is provided
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Done'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Quotes/Availability') , ISBLANK( Quote_Number__c ) )
&& $RecordType.DeveloperName =='Quotes' && $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - RFQ (US)' && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator' && $Profile.Name != 'Honeywell System Administrator' && $Profile.Name != 'DeniedPartyScreeningAPIUser' && $Profile.Name != 'API DATA LOAD'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Case cannot be closed until a Quote Number is provided.
